name: it.unive.easyrestaurant
description: A restaurant management system developed for Web tech course @ Ca'Foscari university of Venice

scripts.install: npm run install-server && npm run install-web && npm run install-mobile && npm run install-desktop
scripts.start-server-local: cd server && npm run start-local && cd -
scripts.build-mobile: cd client/mobile && npm run build && cd -
scripts.build-desktop: cd client/desktop && npm run build && cd -
scripts.generate-android: mkdir -p ./releases/ && mkdir -p ./releases/android && cd client/mobile && npm run generate-android && cd -
scripts.generate-desktop: mkdir -p ./releases/ && mkdir -p ./releases/desktop && cd client/desktop && npm run generate && cd -

author: Luca Bozzetto
